data.displayName: Residential Solar Savers - New To AGL

fees.description:
Fee may be charged when reconnecting or reading your meter when you move into a property or change retailer. Includes GST. Fees may vary.
Additional fees and charges may apply. Please see the standing offer terms and conditions at agl.com.au
Fee may be charged when disconnecting or reading your meter when you move out of a property or change retailer. Includes GST. Fees may vary.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to card payments made at Australia Post outlets
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Visa debit cards.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Visa credit cards.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Mastercard credit cards.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Mastercard debit cards.
A paper bill fee may apply for each bill sent by post. Includes GST
An over the counter payment fee may apply for payments made in-person at a Post Office. Includes GST

electricityContract.terms: Amount of exported energy eligible for the higher feed-in tariff is calculated using the average energy exported daily over the relevant billing period.If we change the higher feed-in tariff,we’ll let you know.Available in areas where AGL operates.More info about the T&C applicable to this offer,contact AGL 131 245 or agl.com.au.Solar terms also apply,see www.agl.com.au/vicsolarterms.Offer applies to customers with an applicable network tariff.
electricityContract.variation: Offer includes variable rates, Solar feed-in tariffs, retail fees & charges, which can change any time with notice to you. If we vary your rates, we’ll give you at least 5 business days prior notice of the variation. Other charges may vary with notice

incentives.eligibility: This plan features a tiered feed-in tariff. For the first 10kWh exported each day, we’ll pay you a higher feed-in tariff of 8c/kWh. Then, we’ll pay 1.5c/kWh for the rest of that day

For new & moving AGL customers who stay with AGL at the same address for 90 days from start of the plan. Credit will appear on next bill after 90 days. Non-transferable. Accounts may be excluded from receiving more than one credit per fuel in 12 months

eligibility.information: Only available to customers with a solar system with a total inverter capacity of 10kW or less who are not receiving a feed-in tariff under a government scheme. Further eligibility conditions apply, see www.agl.com.au/vicsolarterms for details

singleRate.description: For example storage water heaters, with the hours of application determined by your Distributor.

controlledLoad.displayName: Applicable to customers that have controlled load

greenPowerCharges.description: For $1 per week inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 20% of your consumption will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators.
For 4.4c / kWh inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 100% of your consumption will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your market contract is ongoing. From time to time, AGL reviews its offers and this offer will be reviewed with consideration to AGL’s generally available market offers
